description: Using only coconut oil and chocolate, you'll have a fun, crunchy shell on your ice-cream in no time!
name: Magic Chocolate Shell Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g Woolworths dark cooking chocolate, broken into pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and microwave for 2 minutes on high, stirring every thirty seconds, or until chocolate is melted.
Stir in coconut oil. Use immediately to serve over ice cream, or transfer to a jar to store in the fridge.
